title: Square Theory
author: aaaronson
aiHeadline: Square Theory: Because clearly, the universe's most profound mysteries can only be solved by staring at a square for hours, like you're back in middle school math class.

title: How a hawk learned to use traffic signals to hunt more successfully
author: layer8
aiHeadline: How a hawk learned to use traffic signals to hunt more successfully: Because apparently, hawks now have better street smarts than most humans, and they're using our infrastructure to perfect their predatory skills.

title: The Myth of Developer Obsolescence
author: cat-whisperer
aiHeadline: The Myth of Developer Obsolescence: Because every time a new technology comes out, developers just shrug and say, 'Alright, let's learn this too,' proving that they're the ultimate shape-shifters of the digital age.

title: Show HN: Lazy Tetris
author: admtal
aiHeadline: Show HN: Lazy Tetris: Because who needs a challenging game when you can just watch blocks fall without any effort? Now you can be as lazy as the game itself.

title: BGP handling bug causes widespread internet routing instability
author: robin_reala
aiHeadline: BGP handling bug causes widespread internet routing instability: Because nothing says 'Have a nice day' like your internet connection deciding to take a spontaneous vacation.
